articles.description: Sweden progress to the quarter-finals of the Women's World Cup thanks to a penalty shootout win over the USA.
articles.title: Sweden knock holders USA out of World Cup

articles.description: Follow live score & text updates as Leicester host Coventry before Leeds play Cardiff and Sunderland face Ipswich.
articles.title: Championship: Leicester v Coventry before two more games

articles.description: The Netherlands endure several anxious moments against South Africa before securing a quarter-final spot at the Fifa Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Netherlands beat South Africa to reach quarter-finals

articles.description: England midfielder Keira Walsh returns to team training following a knee injury in a boost to the Lionesses' Women's World Cup hopes.
articles.title: England boost as Walsh returns to training

articles.description: Watch the dramatic conclusion to the penalty shootout as Lina Hurtig's spot kick is ruled to have crossed the line meaning they knock holders USA out of the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: 'By millimetres!' Watch dramatic conclusion to shootout

articles.description: The biggest outdoor event of the UCI Cycling World Championships is taking place with the Men's Elite Road Race.
articles.title: Protest halts road race at world cycling event

articles.description: England will be in "new territory" when they face Australia in their maiden World Cup final, says former captain Serena Kersten.
articles.title: England expects as Roses reach World Cup final

articles.description: Watch live coverage from the fourth day of the 2023 Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: Watch: 2023 Cycling World Championships

articles.description: Watch highlights as the Netherlands book their place in the Women's World Cup quarter-finals with a 2-0 win over South Africa in Sydney.
articles.title: Netherlands into quarter-finals with South Africa win

articles.description: Rugby union correspondent Chris Jones examines the decisions facing England coach Steve Borthwick as he prepares to name his World Cup squad.
articles.title: 'Borthwick has plenty to ponder over World Cup squad'
